room_title: Escape room "Professor Moriarty’s Gameroom" by The Great Escape Room in Rochester (NY)
review: While traveling for a bowling tournament in New York...I booked the hardest room I could find! I knew my group had to try and beat the odds of this 18% escape rate! No need to ask...we did it! So fun. Always remember to think outside the box! Great staff and fun!

room_title: Escape room "Professor Moriarty’s Gameroom" by The Great Escape Room in Rochester (NY)
review: Professor Moriarity's Gameroom kicked our butts but we had an absolute blast with Evan's help. The puzzles were a real challenge. We'll be back!

room_title: Escape room "Professor Moriarty’s Gameroom" by The Great Escape Room in Rochester (NY)
review: Came here last night with 3 other girls and were in a group with 4 additional people. The 8 of us did the Game room and we (barely) escaped! Max was fun and kept things interesting and us guessing. I think I could do the same room again and not be able to remember half of the twists and turns. Looking forward to doing the other rooms!
